charges.charge_name: Conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug

place_of_offence.address: Room 606D, Block B, Yau Tong Industrial City in Kwun Tong
place_of_offence.source: at about 1.20 am on 27 December 2022, the police arrived at Room 606D, Block B, Yau Tong Industrial City in Kwun Tong

trafficking_mode.source: Counsel said his role was more like a courier taking the drug from the Lei Yue Mun Plaza back to the room; 1st defendant mainly responsible for taking a quantity of cocaine from the Lei Yue Mun Plaza back to the room.

reasons_for_offence.source: Because the 1st defendant was indebted so he agreed... he owed debts in the region of $300,000.

trafficking_mode.source: the 2nd defendant signed a tenancy agreement to rent the room... he had rented the room and did not lock it, apparently for the purpose of allowing others to use it whenever they wanted.
